description.mek_x_star.space_suit: Turns the meka-suit into a space suit
description.mek_x_star.oxygen_tank: Makes your body armor have an oxygen tank to breath from
description.mek_x_star.space_suit_insula: Adds insulation to the meka-suit so you don't freeze
description.mek_x_star.heat_resistive: Makes your meka-suit heat resistive from hot planets
